Translations.Text: Ha-mima.
Sapatha suspasta kitabera
ami eke karechi kora'ana, arabi bhasaya, yate tomara bujha.
Niscaya e kora'ana amara kache samunnata atala rayeche la'ohe mahaphuye.
Tomara simatikramakari sampradaya-e karane ki ami tomadera kacha theke kora'ana pratyahara kare neba
purbabarti lokadera kache ami aneka rasula'i prerana karechi.
Yakhana'i tadera kache kona rasula agamana karechena, takhana'i tara tamra sathe thatta-bidrupa kareche.
Sutaram ami tadera ceye adhika sakti sampannaderake dhbansa kare diyechi. Purbabartidera e ghatana atita haye geche.
Apani yadi taderake jijnasa karena ke nabhomandala o bhu-mandala srsti kareche? Tara abasya'i balabe, egulo srsti karechena parakramasali sarbajna allaha.
Yini tomadera jan'ye prthibike karechena bichana ebam tate tomadera jan'ye karechena patha, yate tomara gantabyasthale paumchate para.
Ebam yini akasa theke pani barsana karechena parimita. Atahpara taddbara ami mrta bhu-bhagake punarujjibita karechi. Tomara emanibhabe ut'thita habe.
Ebam yini sabakichura yugala srsti karechena ebam nauka o catuspada jantuke tomadera jan'ye yanabahane parinata karechena

yate tomara tadera pithera upara arohana kara. Atahpara tomadera palanakartara neyamata smarana kara ebam bala pabitra tini, yini ederake amadera basibhuta kare diyechena ebam amara ederake basibhuta karate saksama chilama na.
Amara abasya'i amadera palanakartara dike phire yaba.
Tara allahara bandadera madhya theke allahara ansa sthira kareche. Bastabika manusa spasta akrtajna.
Tini ki tamra srsti theke kan'ya santana grahana karechena ebam tomadera jan'ya manonita karechena putra santana
tara rahamana allahara jan'ye ye, kan'ya-santana barnana kare, yakhana tadera ka'uke tara sambada deya haya, takhana tara mukhamandala kalo haye yaya ebam bhisana manastapa bhoga kare.
Tara ki emana byaktike allahara jan'ye barnana kare, ye alankare lalita-palita haya ebam bitarke katha balate aksama.
Tara nari sthira kare pheresataganake, yara allahara banda. Tara ki tadera srsti pratyaksa kareche? Ekhana tadera dabi lipibad'dha kara habe ebam tadera jijnasa kara habe.
Tara bale, rahamana allaha icacha na karale amara odera puja karatama na. E bisaye tara kichu'i jane na. Tara kebala anumane katha bale.
Ami ki taderake kora'anera purbe kona kitaba diyechi, atahpara tara take amkare rekheche
baram tara bale, amara amadera purbapurusaderake peyechi eka pathera pathika ebam amara tadera'i padanka anusarana kare pathaprapta.

Emanibhabe apanara purbe ami yakhana kona janapade kona satarkakari prerana karechi, takhana'i tadera bittasalira baleche, amara amadera purbapurusaderake peyechi eka pathera pathika ebam amara tadera'i padanka anusarana kare calachi.

Se balata, tomara tomadera purbapurusaderake ye bisayera upara peyecha, ami yadi tadapeksa uttama bisaya niye tomadera kache ese thaki, tabu'o ki tomara ta'i balabe? Tara balata tomara ye bisayasaha prerita hayecha, ta amara manaba na.
Atahpara ami tadera kacha theke pratisodha niyechi. Ata'eba dekhuna, mithyaropakaridera parinama kirupa hayeche.
Yakhana ibrahima tara pita o sampradayake balala, tomara yadera puja kara, tadera sathe amara kona samparka ne'i.
Tabe amara samparka tamra sathe yini amake srsti karechena. Ata'eba, tini'i amake satpatha pradarsana karabena.
E kathatike se aksaya banirupe tara santanadera madhye rekhe geche, yate tara allahara dike'i akrsta thake.
Paranta ami'i ederake o edera purbapurusaderake jibanopabhoga karate diyechi, abasese tadera kache satya o spasta barnanakari rasula agamana kareche.
Yakhana satya tadera kache agamana karala, takhana tara balala, eta yadu, amara eke mani na.
Tara bale, kora'ana kena du'i janapadera kona pradhana byaktira upara abatirna hala na

tara ki apanara palanakartara rahamata bantana kare? Ami tadera madhye tadera jibika bantana karechi parthiba jibane ebam ekera maryadake aparera upara unnita karechi, yate eke aparake sebaka rupe grahana kare. Tara ya sancaya kare, apanara palanakartara rahamata tadapeksa uttama.

Yadi saba manusera eka matabalambi haye ya'oyara asanka na thakata, tabe yara dayamaya allahake asbikara kare ami taderake ditama tadera grhera jan'ye raupya nirmita chada o simri, yara upara tara carata.
Ebam tadera grhera jan'ye daraja ditama ebam palanka ditama yate tara helana diye basata.
Ebam sbarnanirmita'o ditama. Egulo saba'i to parthiba jibanera bhoga samagri matra. Ara parakala apanara palanakartara kache tamdera jan'ye'i yara bhaya kare.
Ye byakti dayamaya allahara smarana theke cokha phiriye neya, ami tara jan'ye eka sayatana niyojita kare de'i, atahpara se-i haya tara sangi.
Sayatanara'i manusake satpathe badha dana kare, ara manusa mane kare ye, tara satpathe rayeche.
Abasese yakhana se amara kache asabe, takhana se sayatanake balabe, haya, amara o tomara madhye yadi purba-pascimera duratba thakata. Kata hina sangi se.
Tomara yakhana kuphara karachile, takhana tomadera ajakera ayabe sarika ha'oya kona kaje asabe na.
Apani ki badhirake sonate parabena? Athaba ye andha o ye spasta patha bhrastataya lipta, take patha pradarsana karate parabena
atahpara ami yadi apanake niye ya'i, tabu ami tadera kache theke pratisodha neba.
Athaba yadi ami taderake ye ayabera oyada diyechi, ta apanake dekhiye de'i, tabu tadera upara amara purna ksamata rayeche.
Ata'eba, apanara prati ye ohi nayila kara haya, ta drrhabhabe abalambana karuna. Nihsandehe apani sarala pathe rayechena.
Eta apanara o apanara sampradayera jan'ye ullekhita thakabe ebam sighra'i apanara jijnasita habena.
Apanara purbe ami yesaba rasula prerana karechi, taderake jijnesa karuna, dayamaya allaha byatita ami ki kona upasya sthira karechilama ebadatera jan'ye
ami musake amara nidarsanabali diye phera'una o tara parisadabargera kache prerana karechilama, atahpara se balechila, ami bisba palanakartara rasula.
Atahpara se yakhana tadera kache amara nidarsanabali upasthapana karala, takhana tara hasyabidrupa karate lagala.
Ami taderake ye nidarsana'i dekhatama, ta'i hata purbabarti nidarsana apeksa brhat ebam ami taderake sasti dbara pakara'o karalama, yate tara phire ase.
Tara balala, he yadukara, tumi amadera jan'ye tomara palanakartara kache se bisaya prarthana kara, yara oyada tini tomake diyechena; amara abasya'i satpatha abalambana karaba.
Atahpara yakhana ami tadera theke ayaba pratyahara kare nilama, takhana'i tara angikara bhanga karate lagalo.
Phera'una tara sampradayake deke balala, he amara ka'oma, ami ki misarera adhipati na'i? E'i nadi gulo amara nimnadese prabahita haya, tomara ki dekha na
ami ye sresta e byakti theke, ye nica ebam katha balate'o saksama naya.
Take kena sbarnabalaya paridhana karano hala na, athaba kena asala na tara sange pheresatagana dala bemdhe
atahpara se tara sampradayake boka baniye dila, phale tara tara katha mene nila. Niscaya tara chila papacari sampradaya.
Atahpara yakhana amake ragambita karala takhana ami tadera kacha theke pratisodha nilama ebam nimajjata karalama. Tadera saba'ike.
Atahpara ami taderake kare dilama atita loka o drstanta parabartidera jan'ye.
Yakhana'i mariyama tanayera drstanta barnana kara hala, takhana'i apanara sampradaya hanjagola suru kare dila
ebam balala, amadera upasyara srestha, na se? Tara apanara samane ye udaharana upasthapana kare ta kebala bitarkera jan'ye'i kare. Bastutah tara hala eka bitarkakari sampradaya.
Se to eka banda'i bate ami tara prati anugraha karechi ebam take karechi bani-isara'ilera jan'ye adarsa.
Ami iccha karale tomadera theke pheresata srsti karatama, yara prthibite ekera para eka basabasa karata.
Sutaram ta hala keyamatera nidarsana. Kaje'i tomara keyamate sandeha karo na ebam amara katha mana. Eta eka sarala patha.
Sayatana yena tomaderake nibrtta na kare. Se tomadera prakasya sutru.

Isa yakhana spasta nidarsanasaha agamana karala, takhana balala, ami tomadera kache prajna niye esechi ebam tomara ye, kona kona bisaye matabheda karacha ta byakta karara jan'ye esechi, ata'eba, tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam amara katha mana.
Niscaya allaha'i amara palanakarta o tomadera palanakarta. Ata'eba, tamra ebadata kara. Eta hala sarala patha.
Atahpara tadera madhye theke bibhinna dala matabheda srsti karala. Sutaram yalemadera jan'ye rayeche yantranadayaka dibasera ayabera durbhoga.
Tara kebala keyamatera'i apeksa karache ye, akasmikabhabe tadera kache ese yabe ebam tara khabara o rakhabe na.
Bandhubarga sedina eke aparera satru habe, tabe khodabhirura naya.
He amara bandagana, tomadera aja kona bhaya ne'i ebam tomara duhkhita'o habe na.
Tomara amara ayatasamuhe bisbasa sthapana karechile ebam tomara ajnabaha chile.
Jannatera prabesa kara tomara ebam tomadera bibigana sanande.
Tadera kache paribesana kara habe sbarnera thala o panapatra ebam tathaya rayeche mane ya caya ebam nayana yate trpta haya. Tomara tathaya cirakala abasthana karabe.
E'i ye, jannatera uttaradhikari tomara hayecha, eta tomadera karmera phala.
Tathaya tomadera jan'ye ache pracura phala-mula, ta theke tomara ahara karabe.
Niscaya aparadhira jahannamera ayabe cirakala thakabe.
Tadera theke ayaba laghaba kara habe na ebam tara tate'i thakabe hatasa haye.
Ami tadera prati juluma karini; kintu tara'i chila jalema.
Tara deke balabe, he maleka, palanakarta amadera kisasa'i sesa kare dina. Se balabe, niscaya tomara cirakala thakabe.
Ami tomadera kache satyadharma paumchiyechi; kintu tomadera adhikansa'i satyadharme nisprha
tara ki kona byabastha curanta kareche? Tahale ami'o eka byabastha curanta karechi.
Tara ki mane kare ye, ami tadera gopana bisaya o gopana paramarsa suni na? Hamya, suni. Amara pheresatagana tadera nikate theke lipibad'dha kare.
Baluna, dayamaya allahara kona santana thakale ami sarba prathama tara ebadata karaba.
Tara ya barnana kare, ta theke nabhomandala o bhumandalera palanakarta, arasera palanakarta pabitra.
Ata'eba, taderake bakacaturi o krira-kautuka karate dina se'i dibasera saksata paryanta, yara oyada taderake deya haya.
Tini'i upasya nabhomandale ebam tini'i upasya bhumandale. Tini prajnamaya, sarbajna
barakatamaya tini'i, nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichu yara. Tamra'i kache ache keyamatera jnana ebam tamra'i dike tomara pratyabartita habe.
Tini byatita tara yadera puja kare, tara suparisera adhikari habe na, tabe yara satya sbikara karata o bisbasa karata.
Yadi apani taderake jijnasa karena, ke taderake srsti karechena, tabe abasya'i tara balabe, allaha, atahpara tara kothaya phire yacche
rasulera e'i uktira kasama, he amara palanakarta, e sampradaya to bisbasa sthapana kare na.
Ata'eba, apani tadera theke mukha phiriye nina ebam baluna, ‘salama’. Tara sighra'i janate parabe.
